definition: to see/to look at/to read/to watch/to visit/to call on/to consider/to regard as/to look after/to treat (an illness)/to depend on/to feel (that)/(after verb) to give it a try/Watch out! (for a danger)
to look after/to take care of/to watch/to guard
to wait/to treat/to deal with/to need/going to (do sth)/about to/intending to

sentences.english: Again, this is good news but let us put it in perspective.
sentences.chinese: 同样，这也是个好消息，但让我们正确看待它。

sentences.english: But what did my fellow bridesmaids make of the film?
sentences.chinese: 但是与我一起的伴娘怎么看待这部电影呢？

sentences.english: “What do you say to the charges against you?” I ask.
sentences.chinese: “你怎么看待那些针对你的指控？”我问他说。

sentences.english: Except Reimer never saw himself as a girl.
sentences.chinese: 但雷蒙从未将自己当作女孩看待。

sentences.english: What do you think of luxury brands?
How do you see actually beautiful or handsome poor man do?
sentences.chinese: 你如何看待其实很差的人造美女或者美男呢？

sentences.english: It seems a bit idealist for me to think of money and private properties.
sentences.chinese: 我如此这般看待金钱和私有财产，似乎有些理想主义。

sentences.english: What do you think of High school students' purchasing stock?
sentences.chinese: 你如何看待高中生学炒股票？

sentences.english: What do you think of diversity?
sentences.chinese: 你怎么看待多样性这个问题？

sentences.english: What do you think of the dancers and blaring rock music at tournaments?
sentences.chinese: 你怎样看待比赛中的舞曲和摇滚音乐？

sentences.english: It all depends on how you view life in general.
sentences.chinese: 全看你用什么态度看待生活咯。

sentences.english: The phenomenon of red appear urethral mouth should distinguish between view.
sentences.chinese: 出现尿道口发红的现象应区分看待。

sentences.english: What did Channy think of the defence work?
sentences.chinese: 切尼怎样看待防御工事？

sentences.english: What does Horsey think of the Democrats' fascination with Clinton?
sentences.chinese: 霍尔西是如何看待民主党人对克林顿的迷恋呢？

sentences.english: How do you feel about people with mental disabilities?
sentences.chinese: 你是怎样看待有智障的人？

sentences.english: Some people think that studying economics is boring. But what do you think of it?
sentences.chinese: 有人认为学经济很无聊。可是你怎么看待这个问题呢？

definition: way of looking at a thing/view/opinion/CL:個|个[ge4]
to treat as/to regard as/to look upon as
to look upon as/to regard as
to consider as/to take to be
a re-examination/to have another look at sth
attitude (of the heart)/state of one's psyche/way of thinking/mentality
